title: Please help me identify the name of this font
author: YASSA2067

comments.content:
Font name is Koblenz

Koblenz TS Heavy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829140854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/heavy_5342.gif)

Koblenz Serial Heavy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829140854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/serialheavy_4226.gif)
Original name is Rudolf Koch's [Kabel ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829140854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/kabel). Koblenz is its name for Typeshop/SoftMaker collection.
